getAmountsForLiquidity(uint160,uint160,u.details: Calculates the amounts of token0 and token1 for a given amount of liquidity.

params.sqrtRatioAX96: The square root price at the lower tick boundary.
params.sqrtRatioBX96: The square root price at the upper tick boundary.
params.sqrtRatioX96: The current square root price of the pool.

returns._0: The amounts of token0 and token1.

getLiquidityForAmounts(uint160,uint160,u.details: Calculates the amount of liquidity for given amounts of token0 and token1.

params.sqrtRatioAX96: The square root price at the lower tick boundary.
params.sqrtRatioBX96: The square root price at the upper tick boundary.
params.sqrtRatioX96: The current square root price of the pool.

getPoolDecimals(address).details: Retrieves the decimal places for both tokens in a pool.

returns._0: The decimal places for token0 and token1.

getPoolSqrtRatioX96(address).details: Retrieves the current square root price of a pool.

returns.sqrtRatioX96: The current square root price in Q64.96 format.

getPoolTick(address).details: Retrieves the current tick of a pool.

getPoolTickSpacing(address).details: Retrieves the tick spacing of a pool.

getPoolTokens(address).details: Retrieves the addresses of both tokens in a pool.

returns._0: The addresses of token0 and token1.

getSqrtRatioAtTick(int24).details: Calculates the square root price for a given tick index.

returns._0: The corresponding square root price in Q64.96 format.

getTickAtSqrtRatio(uint160).details: Calculates the tick index for a given square root price.

params.sqrtPriceX96: The square root price in Q64.96 format.

isValidPool(address).details: Checks if the given address corresponds to a valid pool.

returns._0: A boolean value indicating whether the pool is valid.

mulDiv(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Performs multiplication and division operations with possible overflow of nominator.

toUint160(uint256).details: Converts a uint256 to a uint160.
